DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the impact of curcumin, administrated orally, on iron metabolism in healthy volunteers. Iron metabolism will be describe by hepcidin expression that the investigators observed in vitro and serum hepcidin levels.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Curcumin on Iron Metabolism in Healthy Volunteer
